scripts.start: huel build --env development -w -t src/index.html -e src/index.js -o dist/
scripts.start-prod: huel build --env production -w -t src/index.html -e src/index.js -o dist/
scripts.build: huel build --env production -t src/index.html -e src/index.js -o dist/
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md
